turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I need two extra cheese medium pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and you just wanted cheese on your pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would also like them to have pepperoni and mushroom.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, please note that bella luna charges for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 2 medium pizzas with extra cheese, with pepperoni and mushroom, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $38, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine-in, pick up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like it picked up, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
